name: Safavieh_Carson_Grey_Wash_Acacia_Wood_4-piece_Outdoor_Furniture_Set
reviews: Looks nice for money. Off white cushions come with, and excellent value for the price of a similar style of a higher end product at four times the cost!
This set is lovely and good quality craftsmanship. It is low seating, which might encumber some, but the seat pad raises it a bit to a relatively comfortable height.
This outdoor patio set has quality and style. Really like the color. Would have preferred a choice of color on cushions (off white shows dirt easy, but they do look nice.

Patio set is very nice and looks great in our patio.Assembling was complicated, there were extra pieces (screws) that made us think we had done something wrong, and one of the parts was defective as it didn't have the required pre-hole for assembly. We sorted it out, but was way more complex than expected.
So excited to find this set. Added yellow and grey comfy cushions to make it more comfortable.

The look of this set is great. I ordered pillows. So, it is pretty comfortable to sit. Note that this set cannot be left out in the rain/snow/etc. That is a bit of a pain. Still, I really like the look and we have just ordered furniture covers to deal with the exposure to the elements. So, hopefully, it will take care of the exposure problem. It's a great set for the price.
Great set for the price. Fits nicely in outdoor room. Gray wood with cream cushions.Added my own pillows to add color. Would recommend.

For the money, a great buy. The assembly for the love seat was a bit problematic and doesn't feel as sturdy as the chairs. Nice weight and feel. I wish the backs to chairs and love seat were a bit higher.
description:
Create a gorgeous outdoor seating area with the Safavieh Carson
outdoor furniture set. With two arm chairs, one love seat and one
coffee table, this wood outdoor furniture set is ideal for
entertaining guests outdoors. Built-in UV protection and
water-resistant construction help the set maintain its good looks
over time. Color: GreyIncludes: Two (2) arm chairs, one (1) love seat, one (1)

  wide x 23.6 inches deepLove seat dimensions: 30.3 inches high x 50.4 inches wide x

  inches deepWeight: 81-poundsWeight capacity: 250 poundsThis product will ship to you in 1 box.StyleContemporaryMaterialAcaciaChair TypeSetsAssemblyAssembly RequiredChair Back HeightLow BackProduct FeaturesCushion Included
